    • Constructor Detail

      • TuskenRaider

        public TuskenRaider​(int hitpoints,
                    java.lang.String name,
                    edu.monash.fit2099.simulator.userInterface.MessageRenderer m,
                    starwars.SWWorld world)
        Create a Tusken Raider. Tusken Raiders will randomly wander around the playfield (on any given turn, there is a 50% probability that they will move) and attack anything they can (if they can attack something, they will). They are all members of team TUSKEN, so their attempts to attack other Tusken Raiders won't be effectual.
        Parameters:
        hitpoints - the number of hit points of this Tusken Raider. If this decreases to below zero, the Raider will die.
        name - this raider's name. Used in displaying descriptions.
        m - MessageRenderer to display messages.
        world - the SWWorld world to which this TuskenRaider belongs to
